content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 2, Newcastle United 3.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 2, Newcastle United 3.
Attempt missed. Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Aaron Cresswell with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Chancel Mbemba.
Attempt blocked. Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Offside, West Ham United. Aaron Cresswell tries a through ball, but Andy Carroll is caught offside.
Arthur Masuaku (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United).
Foul by Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United).
Chicharito (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Jacob Murphy replaces Christian Atsu.
Foul by Pedro Obiang (West Ham United).
Christian Atsu (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Angelo Ogbonna with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Andy Carroll (West Ham United) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Winston Reid.
Foul by Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United).
Pedro Obiang (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Chancel Mbemba replaces Henri Saivet.
Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Javier Manquillo (Newcastle United).
Substitution, West Ham United. Chicharito replaces André Ayew.
Attempt missed. Pedro Obiang (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Andy Carroll with a headed pass.
Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United).
Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Ayoze Pérez replaces Dwight Gayle.
Attempt missed. Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andy Carroll (West Ham United).
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Pablo Zabaleta.
Goal!  West Ham United 2, Newcastle United 3. André Ayew (West Ham United) right footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal following a corner.
Attempt saved. Andy Carroll (West Ham United) header from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Aaron Cresswell with a cross.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Henri Saivet.
Christian Atsu (Newcastle United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Pedro Obiang (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United).
Goal!  West Ham United 1, Newcastle United 3. Christian Atsu (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Joselu following a fast break.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.
Substitution, West Ham United. Andy Carroll replaces Michail Antonio.
Penalty saved! André Ayew (West Ham United) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Ciaran Clark (Newcastle United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty West Ham United. Michail Antonio draws a foul in the penalty area.
Goal!  West Ham United 1, Newcastle United 2. Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Christian Atsu.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by André Ayew.
Attempt missed. Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Michail Antonio.
Foul by Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United).
Winston Reid (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
